Yemi Ajibade (28 Julaị 1929 - 24 Jenụwarị 2013), nke a na-akpọkarị Yemi Goodman Ajibade maọbụ Ade-Yemi Ajibade, bụ onye Naijiria na-ede egwuregwu, onye na-egosipụta ihe nkiri na onye nduzi nke, mgbe ọ biri na obodo England n'afọ ndị 1950, nyere onyinye dị ukwuu na ihe nkiri Britain na ihe nkiri ojii. N'ime ọrụ nke were ọkara narị afọ, ọ duziri ma dee ọtụtụ egwuregwu na-aga nke ọma, yana ime ọtụtụ ihe nkiri maka telivishọn, ogbo, redio na ihe nkiri.

A mụrụ Adeyemi Olanrewaju Goodman Ajibade dịka eze nke ụlọ Ọ'ràngún si Ìlá Òràngún, Osun Steeti, na ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ nke Naịjirịa. Ọ gara Abeokuta Grammar School - ebe ịhụnanya ya maka ihe nkiri malitere - ma e mesịa ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na London, na Kennington College of Law and Commerce (1955), na The Actors' Workshop (1960), nakwa site n'afọ1966 ruo afọ 1968 na London School of Film Technique (nke bụzi London Film School), ebe ọ bu onye na-eme ihe nkiri Horace Ové (onye chetara na ha bụ naanị ụmụ akwụkwọ ojii abụọ nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ n'oge ahụ).

Ajibade, onye nwere ụmụnne nwanyị atọ (Arinade Victoria, Layo na Janet), lụrụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-ede uri Ebony White, onye ya na ya mụtara ụmụ nwanyị abụọ, Adenrele na Mimi, nakwa site na mmekọrịta nke gara aga o nwere nwa nwanyị ọzọ, Marigold. Ọ nwụrụ na UK na 13 Jenụwarị 2013 mgbe ọ dị afọ 83
